articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks slip; investors watch mainland China markets for reaction to Evergrande crisis - CNBC
articles.description: Markets in mainland China return to trade on Wednesday following holidays on Monday and Tuesday.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific slipped in Wednesday morning trade. Markets in mainland China are set to return to trade following holidays on Monday and Tuesday.
